mated tests, but driving IE and doing testing are two different things. =C2=
=A0JUnit could call a test driver that used Watij to drive IE.
I've used Wa=
tij and Google Web Driver for load testing and for web scraping. =C2=A0Web =
Driver is the better tool for web scraping.
I tried Selenium a couple of ye=
ars ago and at that time it could not handle anything but the simplest AJAX=
. =C2=A0Maybe it's gotten better at it. =C2=A0I ended up using Web Driver.
=
So, yes you can use JUnit as a test framework for web testing with a suitab=
le web scraping API like Google Web Driver or (ugh) Watij.
Selenium might g=
ive you everything you need in one package.
